content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseroot/santacruz/incoming/2021/03/07/378287953_0d07aab0c9684f86b66d69e15e8f6aa0_1.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accsynapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseroot/santacruz/incoming/*/*/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
